item.description: 2016 is produced by Dinesh D’Souza, an author and former Reagan policy analyst, and Gerald R. Molen (Jurassic Park, Twister, Days of Thunder, Hook. Minority Report, Schindler’s List, Rain Man). 2016 is based on D’Souza’s book Roots of Obama’s Rage, the film examines the question, “If Obama wins a second term, where will we be in 2016?” “What [the American people] didn’t know is that Obama is a man with a past, and in powerful ways that past defines him–who he is, how he thinks, and where he intends to take America and the world.” “Love him or hate him, you don’t know him.”
item.name: Movie Meet-up: 2016 - Obama's America
